faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2 BHK flat in Sector 63A Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 2 BHK flat in Sector 63A is highly dependent on the specific project, the age of the construction, and the amenities provided within the society. Generally, prices start from around INR 45 Lakhs and can go up to INR 75 Lakhs or more for premium and newly developed ready-to-move properties. We recommend reviewing current market listings and considering the carpet area and quality of internal fittings for an accurate valuation.

faqs.question: Are the flats in Sector 63A RERA registered and safe to purchase
faqs.answer: Yes, all reputed and new residential projects offering flats for sale in Sector 63A must comply with RERA regulations. We only deal with properties that have clear RERA registration numbers, ensuring buyer protection and project completion timelines. Always insist on seeing the RERA certificate for complete peace of mind before finalizing any purchase agreement.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of Sector 63A to the nearest Metro Station
faqs.answer: Sector 63A enjoys reasonable connectivity to the Gurgaon Metro network. The nearest operational metro station is usually Badarpur Border or sometimes the new stations on the Violet Line depending on the exact location within the sector. There are frequent auto-rickshaw and bus services available that bridge the gap between the residential complexes and the nearest Metro hub effectively reducing travel time into central Gurgaon.

faqs.question: What are the common maintenance charges for apartments here
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges in Sector 63A societies typically range from INR 2 to INR 4 per square foot of the super area monthly. This fee covers essential services such as security personnel, common area electricity, lift maintenance, garbage collection, water supply upkeep, and clubhouse operations. Ensure you clarify the exact inclusion and exclusion list of these charges with the developer or society management.
